title: GenAI in Enterprise: A Practical Guide
subtitle: Weekly insights on AI adoption in software engineering
description: Deep dives into practical GenAI implementation strategies for engineering teams
fullDescription: A weekly newsletter exploring the practical implementation of Generative AI in enterprise software development. Covers real-world case studies, implementation strategies, and lessons learned from deploying AI-powered tools in production environments. Based on hands-on experience implementing AI code review agents and training 150+ engineers.
achievements: Featured case studies from Fortune 500 implementations
Practical guides for AI tool adoption
Community discussions on AI best practices

title: Cross-Functional Leadership Insights
subtitle: Bridging technical and business objectives
description: Monthly insights on leading technical initiatives across organizational boundaries
fullDescription: Monthly publication focusing on the challenges and strategies of leading technical initiatives that span multiple teams and departments. Covers stakeholder management, technical communication, and aligning engineering efforts with business objectives. Drawing from experience managing multi-million dollar technical programs.

title: Modern Web Architecture Patterns
subtitle: Scalable solutions for high-traffic applications
description: Technical deep-dives into building systems that handle thousands of requests per minute
fullDescription: Bi-weekly technical publication exploring modern web architecture patterns, focusing on scalability, reliability, and maintainability. Covers microservices, containerization, and cloud-native patterns. Based on experience building systems handling ~2000 requests per minute and managing high-availability services.
